1.2.0.name: wordpress/wp-prestashop-categories
1.2.0.description:
Displays CATEGORIES of your PrestaShop ecommerce website on your blog. Displays "home categories" (level depth = 1) on your blog.

You need to install the PrestaShop module for WordPress categories on your ecommerce website to use this plugin : http://prestashop.joelgaujard.info/product.php?id_product=17

Some functionalities :

  • configure the URL of your PrestaShop ecommerce website
  • creation of one widget to displays categories
  • specify if you want to display image category
